original_title: 俺の事を見下していたあの女上司を焦らして焦らしてイカせまくった結果…土下座で俺にセックスをおねだりしてきた(笑)
overview: Akari is a beautiful boss lady who has a very tough personality but ends up blackmailed by her employee Yudzuru, who makes the most of this rare ocassion.
title: A Female Boss That Looked Down On Me Ends Up Getting Teased For Non-stop Pleasure… She Gets On Her Knees To Beg Me For Sex (Lol). Tsumugi Akari
